headline: Viatris Appoints Hemanth J. Varghese as Chief Strategy Officer
summary: Viatris Inc. (Nasdaq: VTRS) today announced that Hemanth J. Varghese has joined the Company as Chief Strategy Officer. Varghese will be a member of the Company's Executive Leadership Team.
